title: If You Eat Mikan, You Won’t Catch Colds!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Here, Chika-chan, aaaan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaaan~, hnn~, so sweet, sour, and delicious~! Mikan is so great, isn’t it, it’s so delicious, isn’t it, Emma-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, that’s right. Here, have one more piece<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaaan~.... You can have one too, Emma-san. Aaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Aaaan~.... Yeah, it really is! It’s so buono~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hey, Emma-san, do you know that if you eat mikan, you won’t catch colds?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Mikan is so full of vitamins and nutritions, you know. Mito-nee told me that I don’t catch colds because I’m an idiot, but I’m sure I don’t catch colds because of mikan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see. Then we should eat a lot of mikan, right! Here, aaaan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaaan~! So good-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
